abstract: For one afternoon at least, it was like the good old days again at Chrysler as Lee Iacocca, the celebrated former chairman, urged workers not to panic during tough times.
snippet: For one afternoon at least, it was like the good old days again at Chrysler as Lee Iacocca, the celebrated former chairman, urged workers not to panic during tough times.
lead_paragraph: AUBURN HILLS, Mich.  For one afternoon at least, it was like the good old days again at Chrysler.

headline.main: A Pep Talk at Chrysler, Hailing Its Hero of the ’80s
headline.print_headline: A Pep Talk at Chrysler, Hailing Its Hero of the ’80s
